categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This unidentified individual was a Jedi serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the final years of the Republic Classic era. A General within the Grand Army of the Republic, this individual was serving alongside clone troopers when Contingency Order 66 was initiated. Evading the initial onslaught, they traveled to Dellalt to meet with other survivors. While fleeing the planet aboard an SX troop shuttle, this Jedi was mortally wounded an died on board.

Serving the Order when tensions between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems came to a breaking point, this Jedi reported to Coruscant at the onset of the Clone Wars and received the rank of General within the Grand Army of the Republic. When the Republic's Supreme Chancellor disbanded the Jedi Order with the issuance of Contingency Order 66, this Jedi was surrounded by clone troopers who opened fire without apparent cause. Managing to escape, this Jedi responded to Iwo Kulka's distress call on Dellalt where they met with eight other Jedi survivors. Hijacking an SX troop shuttle in order to escape the world, the Jedi were attacked by agents of the Galactic Empire. The resulting firefight took the life of this Jedi and three others. Their body was taken on board the smuggler ship, the Drunk Dancer after having died in hyperspace.
